title: District Fact for Quarterly Vacancy Updates
description: District Fact for Quarterly Vacancy Updates Documentation
---
import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges/badges';
import TemplateCard from '@site/src/components/templateCard/templateCard';

<TemplateCard
  fields={21}
  collected={10}
  targetTables={['DISTRICT_FACT']}
  dependencies={[]}
/>

## Template Description

The District Fact Template is used to submit counts of all full-time and part-time, vacant, professional staff (Appendix B) positions as of the START DATE. For this collection, a vacant position shall be defined as an unoccupied position that has been board approved and posted to allow the LEA to proceed through the hiring process.

:::note
Any posted position that is currently filled by an individual with a Type 01 Emergency Permit is not considered unoccupied and should not be reported as a vacancy.
:::

**This report is required for all LEAs that report Staff data.**

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit Administrative Unit Number (AUN) assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

Example: `123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Example: `2024-06-30`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `REPORTING DATE`

---
### 3 - CATEGORY 01
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

Constant Value defining the type of data entered.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

`PROFSTAFF`
</details>

---
### 4 - CATEGORY 02
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={7} /></p>

Constant Value defining the type of data entered.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

`VACANCY`
</details>

---
### 5 - CATEGORY 03
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={4} /></p>

Assignment Code

:::warning[Business Rules:]
- If no vacancies to report, then CATEGORY 03 must = `NONE`  
- CATEGORY 03 cannot = `9998` (security personnel are only reported in the Safe Schools Collection)
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

See Appendix B of Volume 2 of the PIMS User Manual for a complete list of valid values.

`NONE`
</details>

---
### 6 - MEASURE TYPE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={5} /></p>

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

`COUNT`
</details>

---
### 7 - COUNT
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

If MEASURE TYPE = `COUNT`, the count should be supplied in this field

:::warning[Business Rules:] 
If Category 03 = `NONE` then Count must = `0`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Example: `2`
</details>

---
### 8-10
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 11 - CATEGORY 04
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={2} /></p>

Staff Employment Type Code

:::warning[Business Rules:]
If Category 03 = `NONE` then Category 04 must = `NA`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

- `F` - Full Time
- `P` - Part Time
- `NA`
</details>

---
### 12 - CATEGORY 05
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

Staff Status (How is the position being staffed)

:::warning[Business Rules:] 
If Category 03 = `NONE` then Category 05 must = `NA`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

- `LTS` - Long Term Sub
- `STS` - Short Term Sub
- `NS` - Not Staffed (No individual regularly designated to fill this position)
- `NA`
</details>

---
### 13-18
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 19 - START DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

Snapshot Date that identifies the quarter represented by data being submitted

:::warning[Business Rules:]
JAN 2- Quarter 2 (Oct-Dec)
APR 2- Quarter 3 (Jan- March)
JULY 2- Quarter 4 (April- June)

Field 19 must = START DATE (Specific to each Quarterly requirement)
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample/Valid Values:**</summary>

Example: `2025-01-02`
</details>

---
### 20-21
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

## Rules
See the Rules Section of the Template Domain for rules consistent throughout all templates

## Sample

**Sample Quarterly Vacancy Updates Submission for the District Fact Template**
:::note
NC stands for Not Collected
:::

| **Submitting AUN** | **School Year Date** | **Category 01** | **Category 02** | **Category 03** | **Measure Type** | **Count** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **Category 04** | **Category 05** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **NC** | **Start Date** | **NC** | **NC** |
|--------------------|----------------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------|------------------|-----------|--------|--------|--------|----------------|----------------|--------|--------|--------|--------|--------|--------|----------------|--------|--------|
| 123456789          | 2024-06-30           | PROFSTAFF       | VACANCY         | 1875            | COUNT            | 1         |        |        |        | F              | NS             |        |        |        |        |        |        | 2025-01-02     |        |        |
| 123456789          | 2024-06-30           | PROFSTAFF       | VACANCY         | 8405            | COUNT            | 2         |        |        |        | F              | LTS            |        |        |        |        |        |        | 2025-01-02     |        |        |
| 123456789          | 2024-06-30           | PROFSTAFF       | VACANCY         | 3250            | COUNT            | 1         |        |        |        | P              | STS            |        |        |        |        |        |        | 2025-01-02     |        |        |
| 123456789          | 2024-06-30           | PROFSTAFF       | VACANCY         | NONE            | COUNT            | 0         |        |        |        | NA             | NA             |        |        |        |        |        |        | 2025-01-02     |        |        |
